definitions.definition: Behaving like or pertaining to people of a higher social status, middle-class / bourgeois people ( sometimes carrying connotations of fakeness , elitism, or snobbery ) .
Fancy or good-looking , without the same connotations of snobbery or pretentiousness as in sense 1.

main_definition: ( slang , usually derogatory ) Behaving like or pertaining to people of a higher social status, middle-class / bourgeois people ( sometimes carrying connotations of fakeness , elitism, or snobbery ) .
secondary_definitions: ( British , Canada , slang ) Fancy or good-looking , without the same connotations of snobbery or pretentiousness as in sense 1.
